printCometDestroyInfo

void printCometDestroyInfo(Space_Object powerComet,
                           Space_Object destroyedComet)
prints a message to the user about a comet being destroyed by another comet

Parameters:
powerComet - the more powerful comet, determened by speed or size
destroyedComet - the less powerful comet, that was just destroyed

printCometDestructionStar

prints messages to do with comets being absorbed by stars

Parameters:
Star - Space_Object that abosrbed the comet
Comet - Space_object that has just been aborbed by the star

printConsumeInfo

void printConsumeInfo(Space_Object destroyedComet,
                      Space_Object absorbObject)
prints message to the user to do with comets absorbing other comets

Parameters:
destoryedComet - a Space_Object that has just been destroyed and will be absorbed by absorbObject
absorbObject - a Space_Object that will increase its mass by the diameter of the Space_Object
